metadata.title: CVE-2015-5957 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer overflow in the DumpSysVar function in var.c in Remind before 3.1.15allows attackers to have unspecified impact via a long name.

criterions.comment: remind: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
